question: Can you tell me about the tallest buildings in the world and generate a simple illustration of the Burj Khalifa?
true_answer: The tallest buildings in the world include the Burj Khalifa, Shanghai Tower, and Abraj Al-Bait Clock Tower. A simple illustration of the Burj Khalifa has been generated.
